import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import Change from './Change' function SectionFourthText({ Title, P1, P2 }) { const [showHide, setShowHide] = useState(false) function showHide1(){ setShowHide(!showHide) } return (

{Title}

{ showHide ? <>

{P1}

: P }
{/*

{P2}

*/}
) } export default SectionFourthText
